video.title: Haven
video.synopsis: Residents of Haven, Maine, are plagued by supernatural afflictions. To reveal the truth, FBI agent Audrey Parker must delve into her own strange past.

episodes.synopsis: FBI agent Audrey Parker comes to Haven, Maine, on a routine case, but she soon discovers the mysterious underside of the town.
episodes.title: Welcome to Haven

episodes.synopsis: Audrey must solve the puzzle of what or who is committing seemingly random, dangerous acts around town, even as she becomes the target.
episodes.title: Butterfly

episodes.synopsis: A psychiatric hospital turns inside out when the patients suddenly escape and the doctors lose their minds.
episodes.title: Harmony

episodes.synopsis: While trying to settle into Haven as a local, Audrey becomes involved in a new mystery: Something is poisoning and destroying the food around town.
episodes.title: Consumed

episodes.synopsis: Something is preying upon the men of Haven, rapidly aging them and leaving unrecognizable, dead old men in their place.
episodes.title: Ball and Chain

episodes.synopsis: Wild animal attacks break out across town, and Audrey and Nathan discover that even the animals in Haven are full of surprises.
episodes.title: Fur

episodes.synopsis: When a Haven man's body is bent, broken and crumpled for unexplainable reasons, Audrey, Nathan and Duke are drawn into a new Haven mystery.
episodes.title: Sketchy

episodes.synopsis: An investigation into a Haven clinic seems routine to Audrey and Nathan, until they hear rumors of a spirit that wanders the halls, claiming lives.
episodes.title: Ain't No Sunshine

episodes.synopsis: Audrey's new acquaintances in Haven throw her a surprise birthday party that turns into a nightmare when a predatory shape-shifter joins their midst.
episodes.title: As You Were

episodes.synopsis: Audrey and Duke's investigation into the Colorado Kid mystery becomes linked to the case of a killer on the loose in Haven.
episodes.title: The Hand You're Dealt

episodes.synopsis: Audrey must answer for her actions while on loan to the Haven Police Department when her FBI boss comes to question her.
episodes.title: The Trial of Audrey Parker

episodes.synopsis: Audrey and Nathan investigate the strange events surrounding a local fractured family when an unseen force begins attacking visitors to their house.
episodes.title: Resurfacing

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious criminal with surprising ties to Haven returns to town just as Audrey grapples with a shocking revelation about herself.
episodes.title: Spiral

episodes.synopsis: Audrey and Nathan discover a supernatural threat unleashing plagues upon the town, while dealing with a visitor who shares Audrey's name and memories.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Audreys

episodes.synopsis: While dealing with the mystery of her own identity, Audrey, Nathan and the other Audrey must stop a terrifying epidemic spreading across town.
episodes.title: Fear & Loathing

episodes.synopsis: The Haven docks seem to be attacking people. Audrey must find what's causing the chaos while pursuing a lead about the mystery of her own identity.
episodes.title: Love Machine

episodes.synopsis: When a series of deadly electrocutions occur around town, Audrey and Nathan investigate -- just as the events take the life of a town leader.
episodes.title: Sparks and Recreation

episodes.synopsis: A wedding at an isolated estate becomes a lethal trap for all the guests in attendance -- including Audrey, Chris, Duke and Evi.
episodes.title: Roots

episodes.synopsis: Audrey finds herself repeating the same tragic day, and she alone is aware of it -- but the more she intervenes, the closer the catastrophe gets.
episodes.title: Audrey Parker's Day Off

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious drowning leads Audrey and Nathan into a dangerous community on the outskirts of town, where children seem to be disappearing.
episodes.title: The Tides That Bind

episodes.synopsis: A bizarre trail of violence is traced back to a man who seems to have spawned an identical copy of himself, but one that's his most dangerous side.
episodes.title: Friend or Faux

episodes.synopsis: When a Haven police officer dies from a terrifying infection inside the police station, the new chief seals the building to contain the outbreak.
episodes.title: Lockdown

episodes.synopsis: Audrey and Nathan lead a search party into Haven's sprawling woods when a local teen goes missing -- and find they are not alone out there.
episodes.title: Who, What, Where, Wendigo?

episodes.synopsis: Audrey and Nathan investigate a series of murders in which the bodies are mysteriously mummified. Meanwhile, Duke discovers a secret about his past.
episodes.title: Business As Usual

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, dead people return to seek revenge on the living, while Audrey, Nathan and Duke uncover and confront their fates in Haven.
episodes.title: Sins of the Fathers

episodes.synopsis: It's Christmas in Haven - or so it seems to everyone but Audrey, who alone realizes that a deadly holiday trouble is taking over the town.
episodes.title: Silent Night

episodes.synopsis: While Nathan and Duke search for a still-missing Audrey, Haven goes haywire thanks to a series of the strangest events the town has ever seen.
Raving barbarians run loose in Haven's streets, forcing Audrey and Nathan to find a way to stop them -- if they can figure out who (or what) they are.
episodes.title: Stay

episodes.synopsis: A Boston cop links Haven's latest stiff to a string of similar cases and leads Audrey and Nathan to believe that a killer could be harvesting organs.
episodes.title: The Farmer

episodes.synopsis: As ocean-related deaths plague Haven, Audrey races to find a connection between the victims before her time to solve the mystery runs out.
episodes.title: Over My Head

episodes.synopsis: A seemingly unstoppable woman stalks Haven's criminals, but her particular brand of vigilante justice is neither blind nor fair.
episodes.title: Double Jeopardy

episodes.synopsis: On Halloween night, Audrey, Nathan, Duke and the others are lured to an infamous Haven haunted house, where they're promptly trapped inside.
episodes.title: Real Estate

episodes.synopsis: With Audrey and Duke following a lead in Colorado, Nathan and Tommy discover that someone in town has the ability to raise the dead.
episodes.title: Magic Hour: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Audrey and Duke unwittingly team up with the killer they've been hunting all season as they track down the only person who can save Nathan's life.
episodes.title: Magic Hour: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: An elderly man's "trouble" sends Nathan and Duke back to 1955, where they search for a way back but instead encounter Audrey's alter ego.
episodes.title: Sarah

episodes.synopsis: A transport gone wrong leaves a troubled person on the loose, and has Audrey and Nathan searching for answers about Audrey's connection to Haven.
episodes.title: Burned

episodes.synopsis: With the entire town of Haven in a deep sleep, Audrey must work with the only other person awake to solve the Bolt Gun Killer case.
episodes.title: Last Goodbyes

episodes.synopsis: A string of murders at Haven High School's reunion brings Nathan and Duke back to their alma mater to help Audrey search for the killer.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: In the third season finale, Audrey, Nathan and Duke square off against the Bolt Gun Killer -- and Audrey's own tragic fate.
episodes.title: Thanks for the Memories

episodes.synopsis: Duke appears in Boston six months after the Barn vanishes and meets a woman who says she has a connection to the Barn and to Haven.
episodes.title: Fallout

episodes.synopsis: The search for Audrey is temporarily halted while Duke and Nathan pursue a Trouble who is immolating Haven residents.
episodes.title: Survivors

episodes.synopsis: Dwight and Nathan investigate murders in which the victims' blood has been drained. Meanwhile, Duke tries to persuade his brother to leave Haven.
episodes.title: Bad Blood

episodes.synopsis: Children begin to disappear in Haven, and Nathan and Dwight believe it could be related to an ancient legend. Duke and Jennifer search for Audrey.
episodes.title: Lost and Found

episodes.synopsis: Nathan's new partner, Lexie, looks remarkably like Audrey but has a much different personality. They pursue a Trouble who can alter others' behavior.
episodes.title: The New Girl

episodes.synopsis: When a Troubled person starts turning his victims to stone, Audrey, Nathan and Duke have to figure out who it is.
episodes.title: Countdown

episodes.synopsis: A Trouble haunts people's dreams and turns them into nightmares. Duke pursues his brother.
episodes.title: Lay Me Down

episodes.synopsis: A Trouble has figured out how to bring the crushing pressure of the deep sea to Haven.
episodes.title: Crush

episodes.synopsis: Audrey must rescue William from two kidnappers who may be the same men who attacked Lexie in the Barn.
episodes.title: William

episodes.synopsis: A Trouble creates an alternate reality in which Troubles don't exist, but Audrey is the only one who understands what's actually going on.
episodes.title: The Trouble with Troubles

episodes.synopsis: Ghost hunters called the Darkside Seekers arrive in Haven when they hear that a legendary monster may be in town.
episodes.title: Shot in the Dark

episodes.synopsis: William confronts Audrey with information about her true origin and puts a curse on Haven when she rejects his explanation.
episodes.title: When the Bough Breaks

episodes.synopsis: Audrey battles to remain herself as the others try to send William back to where he came from.
episodes.title: The Lighthouse
